paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to introduce the notion of states on R-0 algebras and investigate some of their properties. We prove that every R-0 algebra possesses at least one state. Moreover, we investigate states on weak R-0 algebras and give some examples to show that, in contrast to R-0 algebras, there exist weak R-0 algebras which have no states. We also derive the condition under which finite linearly ordered weak R-0 algebras have a state.
